properties.entry: SELECT ROOM_TYPE, ROOM_FEE, ROOM_SIZE FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_TYPE = ? ORDER BY ROOM_NO

SELECT ROOM_TYPE, COUNT(ROOM_TYPE) FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_NO IN ( SELECT ROOM_NO FROM ROOM MINUS SELECT ROOM_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE (RESERVATION_START_DATE = TO_DATE(?)) OR ( TO_DATE(?) BETWEEN RESERVATION_START_DATE AND RESERVATION_END_DATE) OR (( TO_DATE(?) < RESERVATION_START_DATE) AND (RESERVATION_START_DATE < TO_DATE(?))) GROUP BY ROOM_NO ) AND ROOM_USEABLE = 1 GROUP BY ROOM_TYPE

SELECT ROOM_NO FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_NO IN ( SELECT ROOM_NO FROM ROOM MINUS SELECT ROOM_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_START_DATE = TO_DATE(?) OR (TO_DATE(?) BETWEEN RESERVATION_START_DATE AND RESERVATION_END_DATE) OR ((TO_DATE(?) < RESERVATION_START_DATE) AND (RESERVATION_START_DATE < TO_DATE(?))) GROUP BY ROOM_NO ) AND ROOM_USEABLE = 1 AND ROOM_TYPE = ?

INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATION_NO , MEMBER_NO , ROOM_NO , RESERVATION_START_DATE , RESERVATION_END_DATE , RESERVATION_STAY_DATE , RESERVATION_MEMO , RESERVATION_USER_NAME , RESERVATION_USER_EMAIL , RESERVATION_PHONE) VALUES (SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , TO_DATE(?) , TO_DATE(?) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ?)

SELECT RESV.*, R.ROOM_TYPE, R.ROOM_FEE FROM RESERVATION RESV JOIN PAYMENT ON (RESERVATION_NO = PAYMENT_RESERVATION_NO) LEFT JOIN ROOM R ON (RESV.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = 1
